channel.title: Home on JBTips
channel.description: Recent content in Home on JBTips

item.title: About
item.description: Here we’ll share tips and tricks about our IDEs. Do you want to contribute your own? Then go to our repository, https://github.com/dlsniper/jbtips, and send us a pull request. The tips and code displayed here are available under the Apache 2.0 license. This website is built using Hugo v0.42.1 with the Minimo theme at revision f7d501029d288d3073d3bb58ff35a4453e1e7fdd

item.title: Generic tip
item.description: View all the installed Postfix completions #DriveToDevelop pic.twitter.com/6Io0myh863 — IntelliJ IDEA (@intellijidea) June 19, 2018 This is how a generic code tip could look like. 1 2 3 4 5 package main func main() { println("demo") } For a complete list of supported languages for highlighting, see: https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/
